about.title: About GoCheckIn
about.subtitle: Revolutionizing building management with smart technology
about.description: GoCheckIn combines cutting-edge IoT and AI technologies to provide a comprehensive solution for modern building management. Our platform offers seamless check-in experiences and powerful building management capabilities, all while maintaining the highest standards of security and affordability.
about.mission: Our mission is to transform traditional building management into a smart, efficient, and user-friendly experience. By leveraging existing infrastructure and adding intelligent software layers, we help property managers reduce costs, enhance security, and improve the overall experience for both managers and users.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a future where building management is completely automated, secure, and accessible from anywhere. GoCheckIn is leading this transformation with innovative solutions that adapt to the evolving needs of modern properties.
vision.innovation: Continuous innovation in AI and IoT technologies
vision.security: Uncompromising commitment to security and privacy
vision.partnership: Strong partnerships with property managers and technology providers

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team

・NFC (FeliCa not supported)
・or Fingerprint
・Other: Cloud not supported

・Fingerprint

basic.name: Basic
basic.planDetails:
・No lock limit
・Up to 5 app users

professional.name: Professional
professional.planDetails:
・No lock limit
・Up to 100 app users
・Up to 100 face recognition users
・Up to 4 face recognition cameras
・Up to 4 recording cameras

business.name: Business
business.planFeatures:
・All Professional features
・Dynamic PIN Code Notification
・Airbnb Integration
・Cleaning Schedule
business.planDetails:
・No lock limit
・Up to 1,000 app users
・Up to 1,000 face recognition users
・No face recognition camera limit
・No recording camera limit

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.planFeatures:
・All Business features
・Advanced Calendar Management
・Building Management System Integration
・API Access
enterprise.planDetails:
・No lock limit
・No app user limit
・No visitor limit
・No face recognition camera limit
・No recording camera limit
